headline: Southern Pecan Pie
name: Southern Pecan Pie
description: This Southern pecan pie recipe combines sugar, dark corn syrup, and lots of pecans in a buttery crust for a sticky and sweet Southern dessert treat.
recipeIngredient: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Beat eggs slightly in a medium bowl. Beat in sugar, and then blend in syrup, butter, vanilla, salt, and pecans. Pour filling into unbaked pie shell.
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and continue baking until pie is golden brown and slightly puffed on top, about 35 to 40 minutes.
